ai-mil7.4.10:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the four factors for one?”
ai-mil7.4.10:1.2_0: “Great king, the wheel-turning monarch includes the four ways of being inclusive as included in the company of the Universal Monarches,
ai-mil7.4.10:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator who is like the one who frequents assemblies, and attends on the Saṅgha shouldpic for the people.
ai-mil7.4.10:1.4_0: This is the first thing to which the wheel-turning monarch should be the first took.
ai-mil7.4.10:2.1_0: Furthermore, a wheel-turning monarch, a thief, or a bandit, or a thief.
ai-mil7.4.10:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should not give rise to sensual desires by good will.
ai-mil7.4.10:2.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.4.10:3.1_0: ‘An one who loves to calm their thoughts,
ai-mil7.4.10:3.2_0: developing perception of ugliness, ever mindful,
ai-mil7.4.10:3.4_0: cutting off the bonds of Māra.’
ai-mil7.4.10:4.1_0: Furthermore, a wheel-turning monarch on the ocean includes a great earthquake. It thoroughly and good friends, but as sometimes works.
ai-mil7.4.10:4.2_0: In the same way, one who frequents good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind should review these three days: ‘Anyone who has not done these three things.’
ai-mil7.4.10:4.3_0: This is the third kind of wheel-turning monarch.
ai-mil7.4.10:4.4_0: The Buddha has said it to them,
ai-mil7.4.10:5.1_0: ‘As the days and nights flit by, what sort of person am I becoming?’
ai-mil7.4.10:6.1_0: Furthermore, a wheel-turning monarch’s in riches are well tamed, well guarded, and well protected.
ai-mil7.4.10:6.2_0: In the same way, great king, the meditator’s oppressive emptiness is to be placed on the outsider’s gate.
ai-mil7.4.10:6.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.4.10:7.1_0: ‘Mendicants, a noble disciple with hate gives up the unskillful and develops the skillful, they give up the blameworthy and develop the blameless.’”
ai-mil7.4.10:8.1_0: The tenth Questions are the tenth thing.
ai-mil7.4.10:9.1_0: The third sub-chapter on earth is finished.
ai-mil7.4.10:11.4_0: and they were able to a wheel-turning monarch.
